sentences.sContent: Then they chose one gram for weighing water in a cubic centimetre.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then they chose one gram for weighing water in a cubic centimetre.
sentences.sCn: 然后他们将一立方厘米的水的重量定为一克。

sentences.sContent: Theanalysis module can process up to one gram of flowing sample per minute.
sentences.sContent_eng: Theanalysis module can process up to one gram of flowing sample per minute.
sentences.sCn: 这种分析模块可以在每分钟内处理一克流体的样本。

sentences.sContent: One of them combines lithium manganese oxide with other ions, and operates at about three to five volts with a charge capacity of 200 milliamp hours per gram.
sentences.sContent_eng: One of them combines lithium manganese oxide with other ions, and operates at about three to five volts with a charge capacity of 200 milliamp hours per gram.
sentences.sCn: 平面能源正在研发三种不同的电池化学配方。 其中之一是把锂锰氧化物与其他离子化合，充电电压三到五伏，容量200毫安时每克。

phrases.pCn: adj. 革兰氏阴性的；革兰氏〔染色）阴性的

trans.tranOther: the basic unit for measuring weight in the  metric system
